message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList.copyOf' import. Should be before 'org.pitest.pitclipse.runner.config.PitConfiguration.DEFAULT_AVOID_CALLS_TO_LIST'.
Import statement for 'java.util.List' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'STANDARD_JAVA_PACKAGE' group, expecting not assigned imports on this line.
Import statement for 'com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'SPECIAL_IMPORTS' group, expecting not assigned imports on this line.
